amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to reduce Natural Resources Conservation Service funding to FY16 levels.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Natural Resources Conservation Service by $60,543,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 86 - 343 (Roll no. 411).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 86 - 343 (Roll no. 411).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
